column4: is it hard to migrate from gnome to kde? i like the looks of kde better, but my comp doesn't like the kubuntu live cd
theres equivalent apps and kde actually has more

ok if you want just a functioning kde without anything else, install kdebase, if you want kubuntu, then install kubuntu-desktop, and if you want all of kde you install kde (you can use synaptic, but a command line package manager from a virtual console would be preferable)
